'''1.1 build 4''' (also known as '''alpha 1.1.0.4''') is the fourth build released for [[Pocket Edition 1.1.0|1.1.0]].<ref>{{citation|url=http://pocketbeta.minecraft.net/2017/04/changelog-for-11-beta-build-4.html|title=Minecraft: Beta Changelogs: Changelog for 1.1 beta build 4|website=pocketbeta.minecraft.net}}</ref>

== Fixes ==

* [[Dyeing]] a [[shulker box]] no longer removes all items contained in the box
* The Festive Mash-up Pack will now be properly unlocked if owned</onlyinclude>
